scene:
Sector 5 - Aerith
The Church Enter Reno of the Turks Exploring Sector 5 Aerith's House Leaving Sector 5
......You all right?......Can you hear me? Cloud......Yeah...... Back then...... You could get by with just skinned knees...... Cloud......What do you mean by 'back then'? What about now? Can you get up? Cloud......What do you mean by 'that time'? ......What about now? ......Don't worry about me. You just worry about yourself now. Cloud......I'll give it a try. Flower GirlOh! It moved!Whew... Am I glad. ......How about that?Take it slow now. Little by little...... Flower GirlHello, hello? Cloud......I know.Hey... who are you? Flower GirlHello, hello! Cloud struggles for a second, then manages to sit up. He finds himself in a flower bed in an old, run-down church. Flower GirlYou okay?This is a church in the Sector 5 slums.It suddenly fell on top of me. It really gave me a scare. Cloud......I came crashing down? Flower GirlThe roof and the flower bed must have broken your fall. You're lucky. CloudFlower bed...... is this yours? He leaps up. Sorry about that. Flower GirlThat's all right. The flowers here are quite resilient because this is a sacred place.They say you can't grow grass and flowers in Midgar.But for some reason, the flowers have no trouble blooming here.I love it here.......So, we meet again.......Don't you remember me? Cloud- Yeah, I remember you......- Never saw you before
Yeah, I remember you...... - You were selling flowers- You're the slum drunk
You were selling flowers Flower GirlOh! I'm so happy!Thanks for buying my flowers. Or, if you didn't buy a flower: Oh! I'm so happy!You didn't buy any flowers from me though. Well, that's okay.
You're the slum drunk Flower GirlExcuse me, but that's really rude!I don't remember a thing.But I'll forgive you, because you bought flowers from me. Or, if you didn't buy a flower: Excuse me, but that's really rude!I don't remember a thing.Well, that's okay.
Never saw you before Flower Girl......I guess you don't remember. You were walking in a daze.But I'll forgive you, because you bought flowers from me. Or, if you didn't buy a flower: ......I guess you don't remember. You were walking in a daze.Well, that's okay.
Flower GirlSay, do you have any materia? CloudYes, some.Nowadays you can find materia anywhere. Flower GirlBut mine is special. It's good for absolutely nothing. Cloud......good for nothing? You probably just don't know how to use it. Flower GirlNo, I do...... it just doesn't do anything.I feel safe just having it. It was my mother's......Say, I feel like talking. Do you feel up to it?After all, here we are meeting again, right? Cloud- I don't mind- Got nothing to talk about
I don't mind Flower GirlWait here. I've got to check my flowers. It'll just be a minute.
Got nothing to talk about Flower Girl......oh, I see.Ahhh. I wonder whose fault that is. It takes a lot to grow them, you know. Poor flowers.
She crouches down by the flower bed. Cloud walks over to her. Flower GirlJust a little longer.Oh!Now that you mention it......We don't know each other's names, do we?My name is......I'm Aerith, the flower girl. Nice to meet you. While they're talking, a redhead in a blue suit (Reno) walks into the church and stops just inside the door. CloudThe name's Cloud.Me......? I do a little bit of everything. AerithOh...... a jack of all trades. CloudYeah, I do whatever's needed.What's so funny? What are you laughing at? AerithSorry...... I just She notices Reno and stops. Sorry, bad timing on my part.Cloud! Don't let it get to you! Cloud shrugs. RenoDon't worry about me. AerithSay, Cloud. Have you ever been a bodyguard?You DO do everything, right? Cloud......Yeah, that's right. AerithThen, get me out of here. Take me home. CloudOK, I'll do it... but it'll cost you. AerithWell then, let's see......How about if I go out with you once? Cloud steps back and shakes his finger at her. Then he walks forwards towards Reno. CloudI don't know who you are, but......You don't know me......? ......I know you. Flash of white. CloudOh yeah...... I know you.that uniform...... Three soldiers run enter behind Reno, laughing. Soldier......Hey sis, this one's a little weird. CloudShut up! You Shinra spy! SoldierReno! Want him taken out? RenoI haven't decided yet. AerithDon't fight here! You'll ruin the flowers! She runs towards the door to the left of the altar. The exit is back there. She and Cloud run through. Reno walks forward across the flower bed. RenoThey were...... Mako eyes.Yeah, all right. Back to work, back to work. He approaches the exit and then runs back. Oh!And don't step on the flowers...... SoldiersHey Reno, you just stepped on them!They're all ruined!You're gonna catch holy hell! In the back room of the church, Cloud and Aerith hurry up a set of stairs towards the rafters. They stop before a broad gap in the floorboards as Reno and the soldiers run in. RenoThere they are, over there! AerithCloud... that one! CloudI know. Looks like they aren't going to let us go. AerithWhat should we do? CloudWell we can't let them catch us, can we? Then, there's only one thing left. He jumps the gap. Aerith! This way! She walks to the gap and shakes her head. Cloud nods. CloudAll right. I'll hold them off. AerithRight. Make sure they don't get through! RenoThe Ancient is getting away! Attack! Attack! Attack! The soldiers fire at Aerith and she tumbles down to the bottommost floor. AerithEaygh!! CloudAerith! RenoThink we killed 'em? They shouldn't have put up a fight, I say! One of the soldiers advances on Aerith. AerithCloud, help! CloudDamn! He looks up at the barrels on the rafters. What's that......?Aerith!- Hold on a minute!- Fight 'em!- RUN!
Hold on a minute! AerithA, all right. CloudHere's a barrel. If I can just push it over......Push the barrel?- Yes- No
If he pushes the right barrel... The barrel falls down and knocks over the soldier. SoldierNwahh! AerithThanks, Cloud.
If he pushes the wrong barrel... The barrel falls and lands on the ground. AerithOh, Cloud, what are you doing!? She has to fight the soldier anyway.
Fight 'em! AerithA, all right. She steps forward to fight the soldier.
RUN! AerithA, all right. She runs for the stairs.
Somehow or another, Cloud and Aerith dispatch the three soldiers, and then Aerith joins Cloud up in the rafters. CloudAerith, this way. He leads her up through a hole in the roof. They stop for a moment outside. AerithHa, ha...... They're looking for me again. CloudYou mean it's not the first time they've been after you? Aerith...no. CloudThey're the Turks. AerithHmmm...... CloudThe Turks are an organization in Shinra. They scout for possible candidates for SOLDIER. AerithThis violently? I thought they were kidnapping someone. CloudThey're also involved in a lot of dirty stuff on the side.Spying, murder... you know. AerithThey look like it. CloudBut, why're they after you? There must be a reason, right? AerithNo, not really. I think they believe I have what it takes to be in SOLDIER! CloudMaybe you do. You want to join? AerithI don't know... But I don't want to get caught by THOSE people! CloudThen, let's go! They start off across the roofs, Cloud running ahead. AerithWait... Wait, I said! Cloud turns to wait for her to catch up. AerithPuff... wheeze...Slow...... down... Don't leave me...... CloudFunny...I thought you were cut out to be in SOLDIER? AerithOh! You're terrible! They both laugh. AerithHey...... Cloud. Were you... ever in SOLDIER? Cloud.........I used to be. How did you guess? Aerith...Your eyes. They have a strange glow... CloudThat's the sign of those who have been infused with Mako...A mark of SOLDIER.But, how did you know about that? Aerith......Oh, nothing. CloudNothing...? AerithRight, nothing!Come on, let's go! Bodyguard! They continue on and jump down from the roofs. AerithWhew! Finally made it off! Now what... She looks around. My house is over here. Hurry before he comes. If Cloud runs back into the church, he finds two small children there. BoyUm, we're, um taking care of the um, flowers for the um, lady here.......is that ok? Cloud- I don't mind- No it's not!
I don't mind Take good care of them. BoyYeah! GirlSure!
No it's not! That's too much to ask of kids. BoyToo much to ask? What's that? I don't get it.
The children run back to the flower bed. BoyThey're purty! GirlI'm gonna water them later...... Cloud and Aerith continue through Sector 5. Two men are blocking the way to Sector 6. Brown-haired GuyAaaaah...... what a drag. You wanna go to that store in Sector 6 again? RedheadHuh? The hell are you? The hell do ya think you're talkin' to!! Not far from them is a large segment of pipe that's been converted into a small, one-room home. Person Outside the PipeThat guy in the pipe's a weird one. No matter what you ask him, he only answers 'uuh' or 'aahh'. AerithThis guy are sick.He passed out nearby and someone must have helped him here. She and Cloud step into the pipe. Manooh...... aaah......... aghhhh...... AerithThis is the one...... Won't you help him? Manooh...... aaah......... aghhhh...... CloudListen, I'm no doctor. AerithNo... I guess not...Hey... that man has a tattoo. I think it was the number 2. They go back outside and continue towards her house. Man in Straw HatYou ever hear of Wall Market? Cloud- Yeah- Nope
Yeah Man in Straw HatOh yeah? Then maybe I should have you pick something up for me next time you're there...
Nope Man in Straw HatIt's a market in the slums of Sector 6. They've got everything you could ever want there.If you can get there, that is. The road's something else.
Woman Walking AroundWhat am I doing? I'm walking around looking at the ground.You find a lot of things people dropped when you look down. You never find them when you're looking up. Right? Inside the Materia Shop... Materia ShopkeeperI don't care if it's scrap metal or materia. We can get anything here in the slums.Got a lot of good materia here. Why don't you look it over? If Cloud looks inside the shopkeeper's freezer... Materia ShopkeeperHey!Don't come barging into my house and be opening up my freezer! Didn't your mother ever teach you that? Inside the Item Shop... Item Shopkeeper...stare... ......hmph... we only trade items for gil here. In a nearby house, a man is watching TV. ManHmph......! Everything President Shinra says is a lie.But then again, you can't trust that AVALANCHE, or whatever you call them.You can bat it around all you like. But in the end it comes down to wanting to be like those who live up above.So who do you believe in? Oneself! Me! I never lie to myself, that's for sure!I only believe what I say. That's because I never lie to myself. And now for the news.Due to a terrorist attack by the group named AVALANCHE, parts of Midgar that were temporarily out of power will be restored momentarily.Following President Shinra's lead, Mayor Domino also spoke out public against AVALANCHE. Upstairs... FlyerTurtles Paradise News No. 1For delicious wine with a nice ring to it......Stop on by the "Turtle's Paradise"!! Kid Sleepingglug... glug...Now... no one... will find it... num...The top one... and the bottom one... Cloud walks to the set of drawers. Cloud..................huh?- Open the top drawer- Open the bottom drawer- Open the hidden drawer between the drawer The top and bottom drawers are empty, but in the hidden drawer is 5 gil, which Cloud has the option of taking. Back outside... Person Running AroundOutta the way! Move! You want something... move into the store! Inside the Weapon Shop... ManHuh? You want weapons? That's too damn bad......I ain't got no weapons to sell ya! And the reason why is......the weapon store's over that way. Weapons ShopkeeperTake care of yourself. It's the law of the slums. But to do that, first you need weapons, right? KidToot toot! Next stop... Midgar Midgar.Any passengers getting off on Midgar should please ring.You know, Midgar's supposed to be sparkly 'n' springy 'n' sleeky.Oh yeah. Someday, I'm goin' there. They reach Aerith's house and go inside. AerithI'm home, mom.This is Cloud. My bodyguard. ElmyraBodyguard......? You mean you were followed again!?Are you all right!? You're not hurt, are you!? AerithI'm all right. I had Cloud with me. ElmyraThank you, Cloud. She turns and walks upstairs. AerithSo what are you going to do now? Cloud...Is Sector 7 far from here? I want to go to Tifa's bar. AerithIs Tifa...... a girl? CloudYeah. AerithA girl...friend? CloudGirlfriend?- No way!- Yeah, that's right
No way! AerithHee hee hee......You don't have to get THAT upset...
Yeah, that's right AerithOh, how nice.
AerithWell, that's... nice.Let's see, Sector 7? I'll show you the way. CloudYou gotta be kidding. Why do you want to put yourself in danger again? AerithI'm used to it. CloudUsed to it!?......Well, don't know... getting help from a girl... AerithA girl!! What do you mean by that!?You expect me to just sit by and listen, after hearing you say something like that!?Mom! I'm taking Cloud to Sector 7. I'll be back in a while. Elmyra comes back down from upstairs. ElmyraBut dear... I give up. You never listen once you've made up your mind.But if you must go, why don't you go tomorrow? It's getting late now. AerithYeah, you're right, mom. ElmyraAerith, please go and make the bed. Aerith disappears upstairs. ElmyraThat glow in your eyes... you're from SOLDIER, right? CloudYeah. Rather I used to be... Elmyra......I don't know how to say this, but...Would you please leave here, tonight? Without telling Aerith.SOLDIER... the last thing Aerith needs is to get her feelings hurt again... Cloud heads upstairs. AerithYou need to go through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. Sector 6 is a little dangerous so you'd better get some rest tonight.Cloud...Good night. She turns and goes downstairs. CloudOh, man... Cloud goes to sleep. ...seem pretty tired...... Cloud.........!? I haven't slept in a bed like this ...in a long time. Cloud...Oh, yeah. Ever since that time. Flashback to Cloud's house in Nibelheim, where Cloud is lying sprawled on his bed, his mother walking about nearby. Cloud's MomMy, how you've grown.I'll bet the girls never leave you alone. Cloud...Not really. Cloud's Mom...I'm worried about you.There are a lot of temptations in the city...I'd feel a lot better if you just settled down and had a nice girlfriend. Cloud...I'm all right. Cloud's MomYou should have...an older girlfriend, one that'll take care of you.I think that would be the perfect type for you. Cloud......I'm not interested. Cloud wakes up. Cloud...I must've fallen asleep.Sector 7's past Sector 6... I should be all right by myself... Cloud starts past Aerith's room, but if he hits the creak in the floorboards, Aerith runs out of her room. AerithCloud! I thought the Turks came back! Get some rest! Cloud goes back to sleep for a bit. CloudCan't get caught this time... Slipping past her room, Cloud goes downstairs and leaves Aerith's house. CloudThrough Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. I should be able to do it alone... He heads through Sector 5 alone, only to find Aerith waiting at the exit. AerithYou're up bright and early. CloudHow could I ask you to go along when I knew it would be dangerous? AerithAre you done? Cloud scratches his head sheepishly. AerithYou have to go through the slum in Sector 6 to get to Tifa's 7th Heaven.I'll take you there. Come on! She runs off, and Cloud follows.
